learn.validate

Interface ITestScorer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    F1Score, PerformanceScorer, PrecisionScore, RecallScore

    public interface ITestScorer
    Represents a testing score. The testing score can use state until the result is queried. After this the class should loose its state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getScoreAndReset()
      Calculate and return the score.
      java.lang.String getScoreName() 
      void process(IClassificationTestResult result)
      Process an incoming result.

    • Method Detail

      • process

        void process(IClassificationTestResult result)
        Process an incoming result. It saves the result as input to the overall score.
        Parameters:
        result - a result to process

      • getScoreAndReset

        double getScoreAndReset()
        Calculate and return the score. Then the class should reset its state. Undefined result for freshly reset state.
        Returns:
        the calculated score

      • getScoreName

        java.lang.String getScoreName()
        Returns:
        the name of this score
